text: The word Decision can refer to different concepts: == General == * When there are several options on what to do, picking one of the options is called 'making a decision'. Humans and other animals make decisions almost all the time. * A field of mathematics, and economics, that looks at this process is called decision theory. == Law == * A decision is also the result of a legal case. The decision in Brown v. Board of Education was to end segregation. == Sports == * A decision is also the result of a sports contest. The team lost three decisions in a row. * A decision in Boxing is when a referee (official) decides who wins when the one boxer does not win by knockout (hitting the other until he loses consciousness.)
title: Decision
